service

Class ImageRequester

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.ServiceRequester
      • service.ImageRequester

  • public class ImageRequester
extends ServiceRequester
    Encapsulates the access of the Foursquare API. Requests image URLs for POI.
    Author:
    Jasmin Wellnitz

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageRequester(java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String clientSecret)
      Creates an ImageRequester based on the Foursquare credentials

    • Method Detail

      • getImageURL

        public java.lang.String getImageURL(java.lang.String name,
                                    Location location)
        Gets the image url for a point of interest.
        Parameters:
        name - the POI name
        location - the POI location
        Returns:
        the image url; if no image was found, an empty string is returned
